name: Warding Bond
description: You touch a willing creature to create a mystic link between you. While within 60 feet, the target gains +1 bonus to AC and saving throws, and resistance to all damage. Each time it takes damage, you take the same amount. The spell ends if you drop to 0 hit points, the target drops to 0 hit points, or if you and the target become separated by more than 60 feet.

components.materialDescription: a pair of platinum rings worth at least 50 gp each, which you and the target must wear for the duration

effects.description: While the link persists (within 60 ft), you take the same amount of damage the target takes. Ends if either drops to 0 HP or you exceed 60 ft separation.
